name: Darkness Arrives
description: This is a horror game about a teenager called Edie he randomly got these nightmares when he was a kid, in this game Eddie wakes up in the middle of the night as a teen and he hears something but it was just the storm so he then goes back to sleep but THEN the nightmares are BACK again too try and trap the teenager so he can neverwake up ever again. So you have to complete these nightmares from Level 1 to 3 and these levels have these particles a seceret ending and there are also some items you have to collect in the game they are like these which are the teenagers good dreams if you collect them all they will unlock something. BUT make sure you look everywhere because some of these dream particles are hidden behind objects and they have a message so you can go to the next scene in the game GOOD LUCK..
